name: Fate And Hero
description:
When the demon king emerges, so does the Hero. The path of the hero is clear. That is to defeat the demon king. 

But, will the wheel of fate turn around this time? What kind of encounter will await before him?

 
Don't let the hero die before he becomes a strong tree.  Show the world that you can breakthrough your fate.

How to play: 

  • -Click the fate encounter card. 
  • -Watch the the hero save the world
